## Type
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] New module

## Checklist
- [ ] No hardcoded paths or personal information
- [ ] Cross-platform (both .sh and .ps1 if scripts added)
- [ ] Template variables used where appropriate ({{BUSINESS_NAME}}, etc.)
- [ ] Module JSON follows the schema (if adding a module)
- [ ] Tested the setup wizard flow (if changing wizard)
- [ ] Dashboard works in both setup and operational modes (if changing dashboard)
